alert.note: Alert for Coastal McIntosh; Inland McIntosh (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 1:12PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF MCINTOSH COUNTY... At 111 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Wolf Island, or 7 miles east of Darien, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, heavy rain and strong winds. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Some locations in the path of this storm include... Darien, Wolf Island, Crescent, Carnigan, Blackbeard Island, Valona, Sapelo Island, and Little Saint Simons Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to flooding of low lying and poor drainage areas. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so. You can also email your report to nws.charlestonsc@noaa.gov.
